Vuze Requirements:

# There are several ways to discover content in Vuze. You can:
## Select "Featured Content" to see content we highlight that changes on a regular basis.
## Use the search bar at the top of the screen.
## Select categories or channels.
## Search by media type by clicking on the text below the Dashboard and OnVuze tabs (audio, video, all).
## Search by tags by clicking on the relevant word(s) on the left margin.
## Select "What's Hot" to see what's popular.
## Select "What's New" to see the most recently added content.
## Click on the publisher's name to see all content uploaded by that particular publisher.
## And don't forget to check out the "Best of Vuze" for our all-time favorites and top picks!

# Try toggling the Mature filter, especially if you are looking for a specific content.
# Combine searches to get more specific results (for example, click "What's Hot" and then "Audio" for the most popular audio content...).
